Html:
Is there a provision in RTE control to trim white spaces?
I tried the following code but my attempt ended in vain.

string rte = Rte1.Text.ToString().Trim();

I would appreciate if somebody could throw light on this?
Thanks in advance.
There are no provisions to trim out whitespace at this time. What you may be seeing are HTML whitespace tags such as <br> or <p>. Hope that helps.
